Title: Relates to certain payments for the financial support of a foster child
Summary: Provides that regulations shall provide for payments for the financial support of a foster child for one week following the termination of their foster care status and that such payments shall be at the same schedule and rate as when such child was in foster care.
LawCode: Amd ยง398-a, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to certain payments for the financial support of a foster child
